text: @realDonaldTrump @realDonaldTrump, it’s appropriate that Gov. Cuomo asked for 40K ventilator, he has the intellectual capacity to comprehend and use his common sense knowing COVID-19 is highly contagious infection affecting respiratory organ. trump mishandled response.
